description: Comprehensive corrections manifest covering all QA runsheets. Enables transformation from original attribution.csv to corrected version.

runsheets.notes: 5 corrections applied, 2 blocked (mountain survey ADD_RECORDs cannot be stored as separate date+team records); see follow-up-actions.md
DPF review via Gemini vision model - 6 corrections + 2 new records; reverts incorrect D005 from RS011; documents duplicate 40100 and missing 40218
OCR/handwriting corrections - Nov 18 Start Unit 31335→31336, End Unit 31342→31343
SU form review - Nov 9 Start Unit 80796→80795 (resolves apparent gap)
SU form review - Mar 28 Start Unit 11037→11036 (mountain survey forms, resolves gap)
SU form review - Apr 7 End Unit 30740→30741 (resolves gap)
SU form review - Mar 26 End Unit 21407→21409 (resolves gap)
DPF review - Nov 16 units 72088-72206→22283-22320 (data mixing error, Elhovo units in Kazanlak record)

corrections.description: Start Unit OCR error - '6' written over incorrect '5' was misread as 31335 instead of 31336
corrections.source_evidence: DPF review: Nov 17 ends at 31335, Nov 18 starts at 31336. The '6' was written over an incorrect '5' causing OCR misread.

corrections.description: Start Unit error - CSV shows 80796, SU form 80795 clearly shows unit number (date hard to read but unit confirmed)
corrections.source_evidence: SU form review: Unit 80795 is clearly marked on the form. Oct 29 ends at 80794, so 80795 should be the Nov 9 start unit.

corrections.description: Start Unit error - CSV shows 11037, SU forms show 11036. Units 11036-11037 were voided on grid forms and reused on mountain survey polygon forms.
corrections.source_evidence: SU form review (A_20100326_28.pdf): Mar 28 mountain survey polygon forms show units 11036-11039. Grid form units 11036-11037 were crossed out/voided, replaced by polygon forms.

corrections.description: End Unit error - CSV shows 30740, SU form shows 30741. The '1' was written over a '0', causing misread.
corrections.source_evidence: SU form review: Apr 7 ends at 30741, Apr 8 starts at 30742. The '1' was overwritten on a '0'.

corrections.description: End Unit error - CSV shows 31342, SU form shows 31343. Wide gap between '3134' and '3' caused misread.
corrections.source_evidence: SU form review: Nov 18 ends at 31343, Nov 20 starts at 31344. Wide spacing in handwriting caused misread.

corrections.description: End Unit error - CSV shows 21407, SU forms show sequence ends at 21409. Unit 21410 was blank/unused on Mar 26, became valid start of Mar 28.
corrections.source_evidence: SU form review: Mar 26 = 21343-21409 (continuous), Mar 28 = 21410-21439 (continuous). Perfect continuity confirmed.

corrections.description: Unit range data mixing error - CSV shows 72088-72206 (Elhovo B units), DPF shows 22283-22320 (correct Kazanlak B units)
corrections.source_evidence: DPF (B_2011Summary.pdf): Team B, Date 16 Nov 2011, Start Unit 22283, End Unit 22320, Total Units 47. CSV had Elhovo B units (7xxxx) incorrectly assigned.

corrections.description: Unit 61549 duplicate - field recording error where same unit number used on both dates

QA_Notes.note_added: DUPLICATE UNIT 61549: Field recording error - unit 61549 used as End Unit on Oct 24 AND Start Unit on Nov 2. Verified in DPF and SU forms. Pending project-level resolution.

corrections.source_evidence: DPF and SU forms confirm same unit number on both dates
corrections.resolution: Documented in QA_Notes on both records; pending project-level discussion on how to handle duplicates

corrections.source_evidence: D Diary_BG.doc Day 13 (16 March) lists 4 walkers; DPF confirms units 40065-40068
corrections.reasoning: Record was added via KAZ09D-V004 but walker data was empty. Extracted from Bulgarian diary.

corrections.description: Date error correction - erroneous 2011-11-10 deleted, correct date 2011-10-21 used
corrections.source_evidence: Team D diary covers only 14 Oct - 2 Nov (no November entries). Day 8 entry (21.10.2011) explicitly states units 41088-41152. Unit sequence confirms continuity.
corrections.reasoning: Root cause: Date entry error in source file Kaz11_SurveySummary.xlsx where 2011-10-21 was incorrectly entered as 2011-11-10

corrections.description: Date error correction - erroneous 2010-03-08 deleted, units transferred to correct date 2010-04-08
corrections.source_evidence: Excel SurveySummary Row 45 contained incorrect date 2010-03-08 when it should have been 2010-04-08
corrections.reasoning: Root cause: Date entry error in source Excel file cascaded into attribution.csv

corrections.description: End Unit error - CSV shows 50249, DPF shows 50246. Corrects unit overlap with Mar 26 Start Unit (50247).
corrections.source_evidence: E_Summary.pdf page 4 (Mar 25 DPF): Start Unit 50203, End Unit 50246. Page 5 (Mar 26 DPF): Start Unit 50247.
corrections.reasoning: CSV End Unit 50249 created -2 unit overlap with Mar 26 Start Unit 50247. DPF confirms correct End Unit is 50246, creating proper +1 gap continuity.

corrections.description: Walker discrepancy - CSV showed 3 walkers when DPF confirms 5 walker positions matching Apr 7-8

corrections.source_evidence: B_20100409.pdf (Day 17) shows 5 walker positions in transect diagrams; adjacent days Apr 7-8 both have identical 5-walker team
corrections.reasoning: CSV incorrectly showed 3 walkers (Adela, Petra Tušlová, Peter) when DPF confirms 5 walker positions. Walker list corrected to match Apr 7-8 team composition which is consistent with DPF evidence.

summary.notes: 2 ADD_RECORD corrections blocked due to CSV structure (date+team unique key). All 88 non-blocked corrections applied. All within-season gaps resolved or documented as field gaps.

Investigate Peter/Dasha data mixing root cause
Map six-digit mountain survey numbers (300xxx) to five-digit format (Kazanlak 2009 Team C)
follow_up_actions.notes: Affects Mar 6, 12, 20, 23. See planning/follow-up-actions.md for full documentation.

follow_up_actions.item: Investigate duplicate unit 40100 (Kazanlak 2009 Team D, Mar 23)
follow_up_actions.notes: Two distinct SU forms exist for unit 40100: one depicts 'Near the village', other depicts 'Pine trees'. Both are valid mountain/polygon survey forms. May represent field recording error or intentional resurvey.
Unit 40218 is genuinely absent from field records. Sequence ends at 40217 on Mar 26 and resumes at 40219 on Mar 27. May be field numbering skip or lost form.
Unit 11090 is genuinely absent from field records. Apr 7 ends at 11089, Apr 8 starts at 11091. Confirmed via SU form review (A_20100407.pdf, A_20100408.pdf).

follow_up_actions.item: Investigate duplicate unit 11142 (Kazanlak 2010 Team A, Apr 8)
follow_up_actions.notes: Two distinct SU forms exist for unit 11142: Duplicate #1 at top of Page 13, Duplicate #2 at bottom of Page 14. May represent field recording error or intentional resurvey.
Units 22199-22205 (7 units) are genuinely absent from field records. Nov 10 ends at 22198, Nov 12 starts at 22206. Confirmed as field numbering error via SU form review.
Units 22543-22599 (57 units) are genuinely absent from field records. Nov 22 ends at 22542, Nov 29 starts at 22600. Gap corresponds to week-long break between survey days.

audit_trail.transformation_notes: Original CSV had 268 records. Added 6 missing records (2 Elhovo 2010 B, 1 Kazanluk 2010 C, 1 Kazanlak 2009 B, 2 Kazanlak 2009 C mountain survey). Corrected unit data in multiple Kazanlak 2009 records. De-duplicated walker lists globally. Note: 3 records have six-digit mountain survey numbers (300xxx) pending mapping to five-digit format.
